info.title: StockSense API
info.description: API for managing stocks, sectors, and user authentication

post.summary: Send a password reset link to the user's email

message.example: A password reset link has been sent to your email.

error.example: We cannot find a user with that email address.

post.summary: Reset the user's password using a token

token.description: The password reset token from the email

message.example: Your password has been successfully reset.

400.description: Invalid token or user not found

enum: The reset token is invalid or has expired.
No user found with this email address.
error.example: The reset token is invalid or has expired.

items.example: The password field must be at least 8 characters.
